ul.li: Published by: HL7 International - Infrastructure and Messaging Work Group

p.p: This CapabilityStatement describes the expected capabilities of a server that is capable of responding to a follow up FHIR RESTful query from an Intermediary/Recipient. These Expectations are the same as described in the HL7 FHIR® US Core Implementation Guide STU3 Release 3.1.0 CapabiltyStatement for the US Core Server

div.h3: SHALL Support the Following Implementation Guides:
div.p: Refer to the HL7 FHIR® US Core Implementation Guide STU3 Release 3.1.0 CapabiltyStatement for the US Core Server

publisher.value: HL7 International - Infrastructure and Messaging Work Group

description.value: This CapabilityStatement describes the expected capabilities of a server that is capable of responding to a follow up FHIR RESTful query from an Intermediary/Recipient. These Expectations are the same as described in the *HL7 FHIR® US Core Implementation Guide STU3 Release 3.1.0* [CapabiltyStatement for the US Core Server](http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/STU3.1/CapabilityStatement-us-core-server.html)
